Header.title: We are TechnoPoint
Header.paragraph: At TechnoPoint, we provide effective leadership, sharp attention to detail and a valued partnership you can count on throughout the life of your project.

Services.name: Consulting Civil Engineer
Services.text: We provide expert advice, planning and management of civil construction projects, covering  residential and commercial construction.

Services.name: Construction Estimation
Services.text: We help you finalize the approximate amount of cost & quantity of material required for constructing a home.

Services.name: Construction Survey
Services.text: We direct and conduct legal surveys to determine property boundaries, and prepare and maintain plans and records.

Services.name: Interior Designer
Services.text: We make indoor spaces functional, safe, and beautiful by determining space requirements and selecting essential and decorative items.

Services.name: Building Planning
Services.text: We provide customized House Plan, building plans, residential building plans and commercial building plan.

Services.name: Supervision
Services.text: We oversee the construction of projects and monitor activities at worksites.
